definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)

sentences.english: What is the use of worrying?
The more you meditate on God's Word, the less you will have to worry about.
sentences.chinese: 你愈默想神的话，你的忧愁挂虑就愈少。

sentences.english: The eagle that soars in the upper air does not worry itself as to how it is to cross rivers. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 高飞天空的鹫鹰，从不挂虑它将怎样渡过江河。

sentences.english: But I would have you without carefulness.
The eagle that soars in the upper air does not worry itself as to how it is to cross rivers.
sentences.chinese: 高飞天空的鹜鹰，从不挂虑牠将怎样渡过江河。

sentences.english: No anxiety ought to be found in a believer.
sentences.chinese: 一个信徒不该有丝毫挂虑。

sentences.english: But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world, how he may please [his] wife.
sentences.chinese: 娶了妻的，是为世上的事挂虑，想怎样叫妻子喜悦。

sentences.english: God is there already. All the tomorrows of our life have to pass Him before they can get to us.
sentences.chinese: 明天顶会使我们挂虑，可是神已经在那边了。

sentences.english: He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord, how he may please the Lord
sentences.chinese: 没有娶妻的，是为主的事挂虑，想怎样叫主喜悦。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
variant of 擔心|担心[dan1 xin1]
deficient/to let sb down/to cause sb suffering
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
